title: MENy Calculations: Win Divorce & Custody Before You Even Step Into Court
description: Hey man - There's two types of divorcing guys; there's guys who go in blind and pay thousands too much OR guys like you who don't want too.Are you thinking about divorce and don't know where to start? Are you like me and JUST WANT IT TO BE OVER? Many guys have been amazed at how this quick guide helped them win their divorce cases and custody of their kids. It'll get you through your rough times too. And with easy instructions and expertly created steps, you'll be ready for anything.You may think that divorce court favors women and that there’s no chance - but that's a lie! MENy Calculations  will help you  get what you want and give your kids the DAD they deserve.This book will show How to win custody of your kids and avoid crazy child support costs How to build an amazing action plan that works in any divorce case Crammed packed instructions (Step-by-Step) on what to do & how to gather evidence How to find the best lawyer and still avoid ridiculous lawyer fees If your mind's made up MENy Calculations will get you what you want. I’m a regular guy who knows what you’re going through. I got beat down. I struggled. But came back stronger, documented everything and won custody and child support! I wrote MENy Calculations to make a straighter, easier path for YOU. Save yourself $20K in legal fees by buying "MENy Calculations" for 6 bucks! If you don't believe, check the reviews. YOU won't regret it.
author: J. Alfa Mais
